sentences.english: There are so many leapers in this league, so many basket attackers.
sentences.chinese: 聯盟裏現在有如此多的彈跳人和灌籃家。

sentences.english: The coaches told me to dunk, but I would lay the ball in.
sentences.chinese: 教練要求我去灌籃，但我會把球輕輕的放進籃筐。

sentences.english: The mission was by no means a slam dunk.
sentences.chinese: 這次任務絕不像一次灌籃。

sentences.english: The next time I dunked was playing for the Sharks in my second game as a rookie.
sentences.chinese: 第二次灌籃，是在大鯊魚隊作爲新人的第二場比賽。

sentences.english: Last year, the team decided to dunk and layup controls into two buttons.
sentences.chinese: 客歲，團隊決議將灌籃和上籃分爲兩個按鈕節制。

sentences.english: First step is to be physically able to jump high enough to dunk the ball into the basket.
sentences.chinese: 首先身體要能跳起足以灌籃的高度。

sentences.english: Slam-dunking is easier for you Westerners.
sentences.chinese: 灌籃對於你們西方人來說比較容易。

sentences.english: To go on a top like that. It was unbelievable slam dunk contest.
sentences.chinese: 走上這樣的一個巔峯，這是一屆難以置信的灌籃大賽。

sentences.english: That's how I learned to dunk.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我怎樣學會灌籃的。

sentences.english: Slamdunk 09 is base on a popular basketball anime.
sentences.chinese: 灌籃高手09補丁是基於一部流行漫畫製作的。

sentences.english: Finally, the coaches made everyone else on my team run laps when I didn't dunk.
sentences.chinese: 最後，要是我不灌籃的話，教練就讓我的隊友們跑圈。

sentences.english: I scored 7 points, including a dunk while being fouled.
sentences.chinese: 我得了7分，包括被判犯規罰下的第一次灌籃。

sentences.english: He will slam-dunk on them all night.

definition: Jeremy Lin (1988-), Taiwanese-American professional basketball player (NBA)
treasure knife does not age (idiom); old but still vigorous
Lee Lai-Shan (1970-), former windsurfing world champion from Hong Kong
"The Ugly Duckling" by Hans Christian Andersen 安徒生[An1 tu2 sheng1]
Yi Jianlian (1987-), Chinese basketball player for the New Jersey Nets (NBA)
to spar/to fight/to duke it out
lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
